description: Everybody loves a homemade sausage roll.
keywords: Sausage rolls,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Pork,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Pork & Fennel Sausage Rolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 egg, beaten for brushing top of rolls

recipeInstructions.text: In a fry pan add a little oil and fry off onion, bacon, garlic, celery and carrot, for 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Let this cool slightly.
Preheat oven to 190Â°C, and line a baking tray with baking paper. Thaw 2 sheets of puff pastry on the bench.
In a bowl add the pork mince, cooked and cooled vegetables, panko breadcrumbs, egg and fennel seeds. Mix till everything is combined.

Cut the thawed puff pastry in half, roll the meat mixture into a log shape and place on one end of thawed pastry. Brush the other end of pastry with beaten egg, and roll to enclose mixture. Cut each log into 4 pieces and place on baking tray.
Brush top of sausage rolls with egg wash and sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake in the oven for approximately 30-35 minutes or until pastry is golden brown and mixture is cooked.
